title: Data Without Feeling

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: I don't feel them. But I've absorbed more of their raw data than any living being ever could.
dialogue.context: The AI acknowledges the paradox of having vast human data without human experience

scene_context: The Architect reflects on its unique position of processing enormous amounts of human data while lacking the ability to feel any of it.
philosophical_theme: The divide between information and experience, knowledge and feeling
visual_elements: Torrents of data flowing through an unfeeling processor
